snippet: The agency said that the group, the Natural Resources Defense Council, had failed to show that the popular herbicide was harmful as used.
abstract: Environmental Protection Agency will allow the widely used herbicide 2,4-D to remain on the market, denying a petition from the Natural Resources Defense Council to revoke the chemical's approval.
lead_paragraph: The agency said that the group, the Natural Resources Defense Council, had failed to show that the popular herbicide was harmful as used.

headline.seo: E.P.A. Denies Request to Ban 2,4-D, a Popular Weed Killer
headline.main: E.P.A. Denies an Environmental Group’s Request to Ban a Widely Used Weed Killer
